function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Spread of COVID-19 through close interpersonal contact and small droplets produced by sneezing, coughing, or talking","Impact":"High risk of transmission leading to increased cases and strain on healthcare systems","Mitigation":"Implementing preventive measures such as hand washing, disinfection, face masks, and social distancing","Technologies":"Contact tracing apps, air purification systems, and monitoring technology","People":"General public, healthcare workers, and essential workers","Owner":"Government, healthcare organizations, and businesses"},{"Description":"Overcrowding of inner-city parks and green spaces during pandemic lockdowns","Impact":"Contradiction of social distancing rules and increased risk of virus transmission","Mitigation":"Enforcement of capacity limits, public awareness campaigns, and alternative recreational options","Technologies":"Remote monitoring, crowd density sensors, and data analysis tools","People":"City residents, visitors, and local authorities","Owner":"Local authorities, park management, and community organizations"},{"Description":"Urban overheating and urban heat island effect due to climate change and urban development","Impact":"Health risks from extreme temperatures and reduced resilience of urban infrastructure","Mitigation":"Green infrastructure, heat-reflective materials, and urban planning for cooling strategies","Technologies":"Smart city sensors, climate modeling software, and green building technologies","People":"Urban residents, vulnerable populations, and city planners","Owner":"City government, urban developers, and construction companies"}]}
